body:
ITB collector worked perfectly today, when the RabbitMQ server was blocked for a while, then was restarted or crashed. 

```gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:05:21Z" level=info msg="handled request" address="172.17.0.1:60398" agent="Java/1.7.0_131" error="error opening channel" length=2380697 response="Service unavailable right now" response-code=503 response-time=338634558 url_path="/gratia-servlets/rmi" 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:20Z" level=error msg="connection is blocked by broker" where=AMQPOutput.NewWorker 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:20Z" level=error msg="error opening channel" 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:20Z" level=info msg="handled request" address="172.17.0.1:34472" agent="Java/1.7.0_131" error="error opening channel" length=2380697 response="Service unavailable right now" response-code=503 response-time=322873500 url_path="/gratia-servlets/rmi" 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:40Z" level=warning msg="AMQP: connection closed" can-recover=false code=320 reason="CONNECTION_FORCED - broker forced connection closure with reason 'shutdown'" server-initiated=true 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:40Z" level=info msg="AMQP: connecting to RabbitMQ" host=event-itb.grid.iu.edu port=5671 user=gracc vhost=gracc 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:40Z" level=info msg="handled request" address="172.17.0.1:59504" agent="Java/1.7.0_131" error="timed out while waiting for confirms" length=2380697 response="Service unavailable right now" response-code=503 response-time=66786229383548 url_path="/gratia-servlets/rmi" 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:40Z" level=error msg="AMQP: error connecting to RabbitMQ" error="dial tcp 129.79.53.45:5671: getsockopt: connection refused" retry=1s 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:41Z" level=error msg="AMQP: error connecting to RabbitMQ" error="dial tcp 129.79.53.45:5671: getsockopt: connection refused" retry=1.287113937s 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:43Z" level=error msg="AMQP: error connecting to RabbitMQ" error="dial tcp 129.79.53.45:5671: getsockopt: connection refused" retry=2.140443413s 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:45Z" level=error msg="AMQP: error connecting to RabbitMQ" error="dial tcp 129.79.53.45:5671: getsockopt: connection refused" retry=4.522742026s 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:06:49Z" level=error msg="AMQP: error connecting to RabbitMQ" error="dial tcp 129.79.53.45:5671: getsockopt: connection refused" retry=10.652869534s 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:07:00Z" level=info msg="AMQP: connection established" 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:07:22Z" level=info msg="received update" bundlesize=625 from="collector:http://gratia-itb-osg.fnal.gov:80" 
gracc-collector_1  | time="2017-04-06T17:07:22Z" level=info msg="handled request" address="172.17.0.1:36856" agent="Java/1.7.0_131" length=2380697 response=OK response-code=200 response-time=1862161724 url_path="/gratia-servlets/rmi" ```
